<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 5"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Lightless Litheness](/Feats.aspx?ID=2508) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Fetchling" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=300" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 86 <sup>3.0</sup>

</column>

---

Your body is almost as flexible as your shadow. When you critically fail at [Squeezing](/Actions.aspx?ID=31), you get a failure instead. Additionally, when you roll a success at an [Escape](/Actions.aspx?ID=79) check, you get a critical success instead; if you roll a critical success, you can Step instead of Striding up to 5 feet.
name: Lightless Litheness
